title: Cigar For Warriors and The Contenders
itunes:title: Cigar For Warriors and The Contenders
description:
This week we start off by smoking the last cigar from the November Care Package… It was Cigar of the Year for Two Guys Smoke Shop and The Cigar Authority.. BG Meyer Standard Issue.

We also welcome the Chairman of Operations of Cigars For Warriors, Storm Boen and we will let him now how many cigars have been raised so far for his amazing charity.

Lastly, we disclose the Contenders for Cigar of the Year.. Will your favorites make the cut? Tune in and find out…

All this and the usual shenanigans on The Cigar Authority!
